message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. How about we meet in the middle at $130?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I was thinking of offering $110. Would you be willing to consider that?
